scripts.dev:sprint: npm install && cpy ./src/configs/config.sprint.js ./src/configs --rename=config.js && set NODE_ENV=LOCAL && run-p dev
scripts.dev:staging: npm install && cpy ./src/configs/config.staging.js ./src/configs --rename=config.js && set NODE_ENV=LOCAL && run-p dev
scripts.dev:production: npm install && cpy ./src/configs/config.production.js ./src/configs --rename=config.js && set NODE_ENV=LOCAL && run-p dev
scripts.publish:sprint: npm install && cpy ./src/configs/config.sprint.js ./src/configs --rename=config.js && set NODE_ENV=PRODUCTION && run-p export
scripts.publish:staging: npm install && cpy ./src/configs/config.staging.js ./src/configs --rename=config.js && set NODE_ENV=PRODUCTION && run-p export
scripts.publish:production: npm install && cpy ./src/configs/config.production.js ./src/configs --rename=config.js && set NODE_ENV=PRODUCTION && run-p export
